name: Social Club VR : Casino Nights
description: When you enter Social Club VR : Casino Nights you enter into a high-class Casino, where you can play your favorite casino table games, like Blackjack, Texas Hold'em Poker and Roulette. Play a private game with friends you know, or get to know people from around the world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 980 / AMD Radeon™ R9 380 equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space
